statements: SELECT * FROM LocationUpdates;
SELECT id, location_id, timestamp FROM LocationUpdates;
SELECT timestamp, location_id, id FROM LocationUpdates;
SELECT * FROM LocationUpdates WHERE geofence_id = 25;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM LocationUpdates WHERE location_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM LocationUpdates WHERE location_id = 1 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM LocationUpdates WHERE geofence_id = 2;
SELECT id, location_id, timestamp, geofence_id FROM LocationUpdates WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM LocationUpdates WHERE timestamp < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM LocationUpdates WHERE geofence_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY timestamp ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_updates;
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM location_updates WHERE geofenced_region = 'city';
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM location_updates ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, timestamp, geofenced_region FROM location_updates WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM location_updates WHERE geofenced_region LIKE 'town%' ORDER BY geofenced_region ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_updates WHERE geofenced_region = 'Home';
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM location_updates ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location_updates;
SELECT * FROM location_updates WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) FROM dwell_times GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM location_updates
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM location_updates ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM geofenced_regions WHERE region_id = 3
SELECT * FROM dwell_times WHERE dwell_time > '01:00:00'
SELECT location_id, AVG(dwell_time) AS avg_dwell_time FROM dwell_times GROUP BY location_id HAVING AVG(dwell_time) > '00:30:00'
SELECT id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM location_updates WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM geofenced_regions ORDER BY region_name ASC
SELECT * FROM dwell_times WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND dwell_time > '5 minutes' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT region_name, COUNT(*) FROM geofenced_regions GROUP BY region_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT location_id, SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM dwell_time)) AS total_dwell_time FROM dwell_times GROUP BY location_id
SELECT * FROM location_updates ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_updates WHERE location_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM geofenced_regions WHERE region_name LIKE 'South%';
SELECT region_id, region_name, ST_AsText(region_polygon) FROM geofenced_regions;
SELECT location_id, region_id, dwell_time FROM dwell_times ORDER BY dwell_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM location_updates;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_updates WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, ST_Area(region_polygon) AS area FROM geofenced_regions WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT location_id, region_id, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_timestamp) AS month FROM dwell_times WHERE dwell_time > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT region_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM avg_dwell_time)) AS avg_dwell_time_seconds FROM analysis_results GROUP BY region_id;
SELECT * FROM location_updates;
SELECT location_name, timestamp FROM location_updates ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT region_name, region_geometry FROM geofenced_regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT dwell_id, start_time, end_time FROM dwell_times WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM location_updates ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, timestamp FROM location_updates WHERE location_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT region_name, ST_AsText(region_geometry) FROM geofenced_regions WHERE ST_Within(ST_GeomFromText('POINT(5 10)'), region_geometry);
SELECT users.name, analysis_results.average_dwell_time FROM users INNER JOIN analysis_results ON users.user_id = analysis_results.dwell_id;
SELECT location_name, timestamp FROM location_updates WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
